description: Get your group together for an energetic basketball game under the sun at Sportpark Ost.

locationInfo.description: A large sports park featuring multiple outdoor courts, including basketball courts, perfect for a competitive group game.
safetyTips: Stay hydrated by drinking water regularly.
Use proper footwear to prevent injuries.

description: Embark on a fun and challenging scavenger hunt around the city, solving clues and completing tasks together.

locationInfo.description: Explore the heart of Münster with a scavenger hunt, visiting various landmarks and solving clues along the way.
safetyTips: Wear comfortable shoes as you'll be walking for a while.
Take breaks in shaded areas to avoid heat exhaustion.
Stay together as a group to ensure everyone stays safe.

description: Relax and rejuvenate with a group yoga session at the lakeside in Aasee Park.

locationInfo.description: A peaceful and serene location by the lake where you can practice yoga in the fresh air, surrounded by nature.
safetyTips: Use a yoga mat for added comfort on the grass.
Make sure to stay hydrated before and after the session.

description: Take a guided bike tour around Münster's scenic Promenade, enjoying the summer weather and historic views.

locationInfo.description: A relaxed biking tour around Münster's Promenade, an 8-km circular path around the city center with beautiful views of the city and green spaces.
safetyTips: Bring a water bottle to stay hydrated.
Follow traffic rules and signal your turns.

description: Organize a relaxing picnic with your group in the beautiful Schlosspark, surrounded by historic architecture and greenery.

locationInfo.description: A relaxing outdoor picnic at Schlosspark, located in the heart of Münster with wide green spaces perfect for group gatherings.
safetyTips: Bring a blanket and enough food and drinks for the group.
Stay in shaded areas during peak heat.
Dispose of any waste responsibly to keep the park clean.
